mapper.sql: news_id, keyword, stu_id, news_img, comment_num, praise_num, browse_num, create_time, news_img1, news_img2
mapper.select:
select
,
from news order by news_id DESC limit 1

select
,
from news order by news_id DESC limit #{start},10

select
,
from news where keyword = #{keyword} order by news_id DESC limit #{start},10
mapper.insert: insert into news (news_id, keyword, stu_id, news_img, comment_num, praise_num, browse_num, create_time, news_img1, news_img2, news_cont) values (#{newsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stuId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{newsImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commentNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{praiseNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{browseNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{newsImg1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{newsImg2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{newsCont,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update news
keyword = #{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stu_id = #{stuId,jdbcType=CHAR},
news_img = #{newsImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
comment_num = #{commentNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
praise_num = #{praiseNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
browse_num = #{browseNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},

news_img2 = #{newsImg2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
news_cont = #{newsCont,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where news_id = #{newsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
